action.action-desc: Mr. Enzi (for himself and Mr. Thune) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To provide for conditions on the renewal of health insurance plans purchased through Exchanges.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Heath Care Consumer Choices Preservation Act
.

section.header: Conditions on renewal of health plans purchased through exchanges

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, a qualified health plan purchased by an individual through an American Health Benefit Exchange for plan year 2014 shall not be automatically renewed with respect to such individual for plan year 2015 unlessâ€”

paragraph.text: the plan premium for plan year 2015 is the same as the plan premium for plan year 2014; or
the individual requests such automatic renewal of the plan.

subsection.text: A plan may be automatically renewed as described in subsection (a)(1) only if the cost of the premium to the individual would be the same for plan year 2015 as for plan year 2014, before and after application of a premium assistance credit under section 36B of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as applicable.
